comment: most amazing lady ever love her to death she creates such a beautiful area to learn and grow and extremely helpful, wonderful person and professor

I love Keely and I look forward to every class I have with her. She's truly my favorite professor, she wants you to learn to grow and she's always there to help you. Her classes are so much fun and hands on, I recommend her classes a thousand times over

Keely was sent from above. Her classes are easy if you care and pay attention. She's not big on lecturing. Everyone participates in class discussions about the industry. She is accessible outside of class. She genuinely cares but if you don't she won't give you the time of day.

Mrs. Clay is like a dream professor that fell off inspirational university heaven and here to teach of us all about fashion. My two years of learning all about fashion won't be the same without her and how much she truly care about us student individually. Your Participation matters because most are group work, but be ready to inspired and learn.

Clay is awesome! She really cares for her student and tries to make the work as simple as possible for the student. Honestly, if you don't succeed in any of her courses then it is probably 99.8%  your fault and not hers, because she makes courses too easy for you to understand. Go to class, do the assignments, and stay involved then you pass!
Love Professor Clay! ATT 1200 was extremely interesting and fun to take. One discussion due weekly (EASY) and three exams (take home-EASY). Final project over country of choice was easy and fun!

She is amazing! She cares! She works verrrrrrrrry hard! Sometimes the directions are short. Do not worry though. Take the direction in the most simple way. She is not trying to trick you. Just ask her questions. As long as you try and work hard she will love you!
Keely is a great professor. She knows what is teaching and clearly shows that. She can be a bit quick, but she works to accommodate each student.

I love Professor Clay! She is so funny and that makes the class much better and not as boring. I was dreading this class but I was so impressed after it was over. 10/10  Would take again definitely.  Her milkshake brings all the students to the class.

She works with her students always. Great at clarifying and explaining how to use the programs. No matter what she will always answer your e-mails as well as individually work with you if need be. She has a great understanding of the course and really wants what is best for her students. Great professor!

LOVE Professor Clay! She's very descriptive in what she expects for you to know and learn. Her test are straight forward and not too tedious! In order to get notes, you must attend class. She does not post in D2L or Vista. All in all, SHES AWESOME, FUN, and gets the job done!! :)

Keely's always awesome. You'll pretty much have to take her for a lot of the ATT curriculum, and she knows all the students. She didn't care about attendance, she just wants everyone to get good grades and to participate in discussion when you are in class. She is really understanding and down-to-earth.
